thread.section_title: Airtasker Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Airtasker | www.airtasker.com
thread.title: Roy Kelly

author: Roy Kelly
title: Roy Kelly
text: This is the first time I have used Airtasker. As an older person I'm always sceptical of new sites, but this was easy to install on the iPad and easy to use. I posted a task and got a response in less than a minute, three hours later the task was completed by a very competent Airtasker, monies were released and I carried on with my day. Excellent company, great idea, Wow.
